name: Routine (itch) (mapedorr)
description:
[ - About the story - ]

X daydreams during his trip from home to the office. Almost every day. Go through his dreams to know about him. Maybe you share some of them.

[ - About the controls - ]

Use the arrow keys to interact with the elements in each room or to take a path to another one.

[ ! ] Do not click anything during or after the splash screen (the one that says the name of the game). That will break the game. :'-(

[ - About the tools & the jam - ]

I used the Bitsy editor to make this game and this is my first submission for the monthly Bitsy Jam (#bitsyjam). The theme for this month was Daydream.
